text: Mohla baromuoa ba Rona ba neng ba fihla ho Lota, o n’a be a le maqakabetsing ke liketso tsa mehahabo, hobane o ne a hloleha ho ba s’ireletsa; empa baromuoa ba ile ba re: “Se ts’ohe le hona hoba mahlomoleng! Ruri! Re tla u pholosa le lelapa la hau kaofela, ntle feela le mosali oa hau, eo eena a tlang hoba har’a ba saletseng morao
